page.title: 03EVENTS
page.content: IN SEPTEMBER THERE IS THE REDDITCH CARNIVAL.THERE IS A PROCESSION, PEOPLE WALK THROUGH THE TOWN DRESSED IN FANCY CLOTHES COLLECTING FOR CHARITY.IN JUNE THE WATER FIESTA IS HELD, AND IN JULY THE CHERRY WAKE FAIR .AT REDDITCH CARNIVAL PEOPLE CAN GO ON A FLOAT.THAT IS A LORRY THAT HAS BEEN DECORATED IN SOME WAY TO LOOK BRIGHT AND GAY.THE PEOPLE ON THE FLOAT WILL DRESS IN EXOTIC COSTUME OR IN AN AMUSING WAY,THEY ENCOURAGE PEOPLE WHO ARE WATCHING THE PROCESSION TO THROW MONEY, THIS WILL THEN BE GIVEN TO A LOCAL CHARITY.THE WATER FIESTA IS HELD EVERY JUNE,THE PEOPLE FROM REDDITCH GO TO ARROW VALLEY LAKE THERE ARE RAFT RACES BOAT RACES,A FAIR,MODELS AND DISPLAYS.THERE ARE MANY GROUPS THAT MEET IN REDDITCH,PLAY GROUPS,SUNDAY SCHOOL.JUDO,SWIMMING CLUB,DANCING,AND MANY SPORTS EVENTS.
